name: Way Home (itch) (soeyzandiego, pr1mus, PoeMcMoe, wnlowe)
description:
Made for Beginners Circle Jam #3 by Team Panda

The planet is moments away from destruction and you must escape! Your satellite has broken and you aren't able to locate the nearest planet. Collect enough minerals, using your mining laser, to repair your satellite and fend off enemies with your gun. Return to your satellite once you have enough minerals! Time is ticking!

Controls:

Move - WASD/Arrow keys

Select Laser - 1

Select Pistol - 2

Select SMG - 3

Fire - Left Mouse

!!! KNOWN BUGS !!!

[FIXED] Dying from the enemies in or running out of time in level two will cause an error

[FIXED] The crosshair will be shifted from its proper position

[FIXED] If the player opens the satellite after killing an enemy, the game will stop after exiting the canvas
